import React , { useState } from 'react' import { Tooltip } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const SingleActor = ({name, id, profile_path, known_for_department, popularity}) => { const [tooltipOpen, setTooltipOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setTooltipOpen(!tooltipOpen); return ( <>
{name}
(profile_path) ?

{name}

Known for {known_for_department}

Popularity {popularity}

 ) } export default SingleActor
